items.title: Philips Avent Drinkbeker
items.description: BPA-vrije drinkbeker met zachte tuit en handvatten, ideaal voor jonge kinderen die leren drinken. Gemakkelijk schoon te maken en lekvrij ontwerp.

items.title: Minismus Keukenrolhouder Zwart Staand
items.description: Simple kitchen roll holder that allows for easy one-handed tearing of paper towels. Sleek design fits any kitchen decor.

items.title: Dopper Steel Drinkfles - 1,1L
items.description: Duurzame roestvrijstalen drinkfles met een inhoud van 1,1 liter. Houdt dranken lang koud of warm en is perfect voor onderweg.

items.title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of The Kingdom Nintendo Switch 2 Edition
items.description: The latest installment in the beloved Legend of Zelda series, featuring an expansive open world, innovative gameplay mechanics, and a captivating storyline.

items.title: Belkin BoostCharge 3-in-1 Qi2 Charger
items.description: Wireless charging station for iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods. Sleek design with fast charging capabilities for multiple devices simultaneously.

items.title: Maxi-Cosi Toucan 3-in-1 Learning Tower
items.description: Adjustable learning tower for children, providing a safe and sturdy platform for kids to participate in kitchen activities and learn new skills.

items.title: Bambu Lab AMS HT - Automatic Material System
items.description: High-temperature filament management system for Bambu Lab 3D printers, designed for advanced materials requiring elevated printing temperatures.

items.title: Bambu Lab A1 mini 3D Printer
items.description: Compact and efficient 3D printer with high-speed printing capabilities and advanced features for hobbyists and professionals.

items.title: Bambu Lab AMS 2 Pro - Automatic Material System
items.description: Advanced filament management system for Bambu Lab 3D printers, enabling multi-material printing with ease and efficiency.
